channel.title: [tut]how to make yourself an admin on rscd v25[/tut]
channel.description:
this is really easy there is 2 things to change
FOURMS ADMIN: goto your phpmyadmin click on the side rscd click browse on rscd players and where it says group id put 1 - IN GAME ADMIN: stay in your phpmyadmin goto browse user and where it says group id change it to 1.
well i hope this help you guys i know its probably been posted before if it has pm me and ill remove right away [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] RSC section rules forbid tutorials.[/center]

item.title: [tut]how to make yourself an admin on rscd v25[/tut]
item.dc:creator: @Krypton1 Krypton
item.description:
@Krypton1 wrote:

The funny thing is, he got them mixed up, you go to rscd_players to for ingame admin and users for forum admin.

Read full topic
item.source: [tut]how to make yourself an admin on rscd v25[/tut]

item.title: [tut]how to make yourself an admin on rscd v25[/tut]
item.dc:creator: @H4CK3R_OWNAGE H4CK3R OWNAGE
item.description:
@H4CK3R_OWNAGE wrote:

this is really easy there is 2 things to change

FOURMS ADMIN:
goto your phpmyadmin click on the side rscd
click browse on rscd players and where it says group id put 1

IN GAME ADMIN:
stay in your phpmyadmin goto browse user and where it says group id change it to 1.

well i hope this help you guys i know its probably been posted before if it has pm me and ill remove right away
